Reviews.Title: Nice Little Set
Reviews.Author: Donald E. Schriver
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV for a bedroom. The TV is viewed from about 8 feet and the picture clarity and view ability are better than I thought it would be. Easy set up as well with cable!

Reviews.Title: CC features for analog channels OK
Reviews.Author: N. Rybkina
Reviews.Content: - Close Caption features for ANALOG channels like font size and color, not digital only.- "Freeze" work with analog channels also!- Speakers good- boombox type, not notebook type.- Sound level all time AUTO, it is not mentioned in manual.Cons: remote have not CC key, keys very small, menu navigation keys do not repeat CH - Volume, CC hold two row only-can not collect text.

Reviews.Title: Unreal Value
Reviews.Author: Y-Not "John"
Reviews.Content: Long story short - Great TV.  I use it primarily for a monitor for my laptop.  I connect via HDMI and the picture is awesome the sound is excellent and when I watch TV with it a very clean bright picture.  Amazon price matched this so for $149 it was a steal a good deal at $225.  I was cautious because I don't know anything about Magnavox but if it holds I'm a happy camper.Remote is good Too!

Reviews.Title: This thing is my best friend that plugs in.
Reviews.Author: Will2Combat
Reviews.Content: For years I toted this TV around.From job to job, in and out of college, home to home, and state to state. It hasn't broken, it hasn't malfunctioned, it's light enough to be backpack friendly and high enough resolution to sit two friends side-by-side for a Soul Calibur marathon without issue.This is an excellent buy for the price and for a student or whoever who needs a versatile, comfortable high-def monitor. I use it for my PC and for my PS3 and while the sound is merely ok a good set of headphones fixes that.For the people who'd use it the most it's damn hard to beat in value. I bought this is September of 2011, and it hasn't let me down yet.And when it inevitably wears out it'll be cheap to replace.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supports 1080i,720P,480i,480p
Side PC Input,2 HDMI inputs
1366 x 768 WXGA res
Sleep Timer, auto shut off
5 band EQ and ECO
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 19MF330B/F7 19-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Black
